Text: Re kk wish list Cc has Cliff and Deirdre should get the kind of VCR that marks the commercials and when you play back the recorded TV show it SKIPS the commercials Yes technology is a wonderful thing Everyone witnessed it here when we watched a taped episode of the West Wing Its a little extra but well worth it mer Original Message From Deirdre Robinson To Cc Sent Wednesday November AM Subject Re kk wish list HI all Cliff and Meg and Ben and I had a great time in Chicago for Thanksgiving and Charlies christening Big brother Jack and Charlie are doing great I worked on Jack all weekend and by the time I left he was walking around saying DEE DEE We are still working on the AUNT part Cliff and I were thinking about a VCR for Christmas Dont know how expensive they are need to check the paper Thats our only thought right now more later Deirdre
